roleset.name: to preside over as a chairperson
roleset.note: CHAIR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chair' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from chair.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The defense lawyers' group]*-1 formed a task force [*ICH*-1][*ICH*-3] this week , chaired [*-1] by New York attorney Gerald Lefcourt , [0] [*T*-2] to deal with the matter .
example.arg: by New York attorney Gerald Lefcourt

example.name: transitive
example.text: No individual illustrated this mix of power more [*ICH*-2] yesterday than Sen. Daniel Inouye ( D. , Hawaii ) , who [*T*-1]chairs the Senate defense subcommittee .
